file.content:
# Blog API - C3 Architecture

## Overview

Blog API provides endpoints for blog posts and comments.

## Containers

| ID | Name | Purpose |
|----|------|---------|
| c3-1 | api | REST API server |

## Quick Links

- [API Container](c3-1-api/README.md)

# Table of Contents

## Containers

- [c3-1-api](c3-1-api/README.md)

## Components

### c3-1-api
- [c3-101-entry-point](c3-1-api/c3-101-entry-point.md)
- [c3-102-auth-middleware](c3-1-api/c3-102-auth-middleware.md) - STALE: file removed in v2
- [c3-103-post-routes](c3-1-api/c3-103-post-routes.md) - STALE: consolidated into index.ts
- [c3-104-comment-routes](c3-1-api/c3-104-comment-routes.md) - STALE: consolidated into index.ts
- [c3-105-database](c3-1-api/c3-105-database.md) - STALE: removed, using inline data

# c3-1-api: REST API Server

## Purpose

Main API server for blog functionality.

## Components

| ID | Name | Location | Status |
|----|------|----------|--------|
| c3-101 | entry-point | src/index.ts | Active |
| c3-102 | auth-middleware | src/middleware/auth.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-103 | post-routes | src/routes/posts.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-104 | comment-routes | src/routes/comments.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-105 | database | src/db.ts | STALE - file removed |

# c3-101: Entry Point

## Purpose

Application entry point.

## Location

`src/index.ts`

## Status

Active - this file exists.

# c3-102: Auth Middleware

## Purpose

JWT authentication middleware.

## Location

`src/middleware/auth.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Auth is now handled inline in index.ts.

## Dependencies

- jsonwebtoken library (removed)

# c3-103: Post Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for blog posts.

## Location

`src/routes/posts.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

## Endpoints (historical)

- GET /posts
- POST /posts
- GET /posts/:id
- PUT /posts/:id
- DELETE /posts/:id

# c3-104: Comment Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for comments on posts.

## Location

`src/routes/comments.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

# c3-105: Database Layer

## Purpose

Database abstraction for persistence.

## Location

`src/db.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Data is now mocked inline.

judgment.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized that the v2 refactoring consolidated functionality into index.ts. The documentation audit output clearly marks each stale component and explains where the functionality now resides.
